text: The Brilliance BS2 or FRV and FSV is a car produced by the Brilliance Auto in the People's Republic of China. ==Overview== It was originally announced at the Frankfurt Motor Show in 2007 as a pre-production carMSN Cars 12 September 2007 and then at the Beijing Auto Show in 2008, and was given its European premiere at the 2009 Geneva Motor Show. Prior to its public launch, it was named Brilliance A1.China Car Times 17 April 2007 It was designed by Italdesign Giugiaro and developed in China as a 5-door small family hatchback to complement the larger Brilliance BS4 and BS6.Ital Design model page A 4-door saloon version was also developed and is sold as the Brilliance FSV. The FRV Cross is a crossover style variant with different trim but sharing the same mechanicals as the FRV and FSV.China Car Times 5 January 2009 The BS2 is not widely exported, and despite its display at Frankfurt and Geneva, the car was never launched in Europe due to the bad press received by the crash test results of the larger BS6 and Brilliance withdrew from European. The BS2 received a facelift in 2010 with alterations to the front bumper and grille.China Car Times 16 December 2009 ==Specifications== The BS2 was originally powered by a Mitsubishi 1.6 L 4-cylinder 16-valve petrol engine (Euro III), producing .Brilliance BS2 Egypt website This engine was later replaced with a Euro IV rated 1.5 L engine of Brilliance's own design. ==Gallery== File:Brilliance BS2.jpg|Brilliance BS2 File:Brilliance BS2 rear.jpg|Brilliance BS2 rear File:Brilliance Junjie FRV 01 China 2012-06-23.jpg|Brilliance Junjie FRV front File:Brilliance Junjie FRV 02 China 2012-06-23.jpg|Brilliance Junjie FRV rear File:Brilliance Junjie FRV facelift 01 China 2012-04-22.jpg|Brilliance Junjie FRV facelift front File:Brilliance Junjie FRV facelift 02 China 2012-04-22.jpg|Brilliance Junjie FRV facelift rear File:Brilliance FSV 2013.4.19.jpg|Brilliance FSV front File:Brilliance FSV Rear 2013.4.19.jpg|Brilliance FSV rear FSV SPORT-FRONTAL.jpg|Brilliance FSV Sport front FSV SPORT-POSTERIOR.jpg|Brilliance FSV Sport rear Brilliance FSV Sedan 1.5 RS 2014 (12530148875).jpg|Brilliance FSV RS front Brilliance FSV 1.5 RS Sedan 2014 (12894431294).jpg|Brilliance FSV RS rear File:Brilliance Junjie FSV facelift 01 China 2012-04-15.jpg|Brilliance Junjie FSV facelift front File:Brilliance Junjie FSV facelift 02 China 2012-04-15.jpg|Brilliance Junjie FSV facelift rear File:Brilliance Auto Cross 2010 China.jpg|BS2 FRV Cross ==References== ==External links== *Brilliance FRV website BS2 Category:Cars of China Category:Compact cars Category:Italdesign vehicles Category:2010s cars Category:Cars introduced in 2008
